sent.orig: We offer the formal description of negotiation protocol, negotiation strategies and the decision model for negotiation.
sent.trans: 这里主要讨论了协商协议的规范化描述，协商策略的表示和规划，以及协商中的建模问题。

sent.orig: And true negotiation is quarto only then, negotiation place trades in Shanghai negotiable securities edifice.
sent.trans: 而真正的谈判是在上周四开始，谈判地点在上海证券交易大厦。

sent.orig: Summarize field experience in contract negotiation and provide written guidance on negotiation principle and tactics.
sent.trans: 总结合同谈判经验并输出相关指导书。

sent.orig: Finally, the ABAM presents a new negotiation protocol to guide the negotiation process.
sent.trans: 最后，模型中提出一种新的协商协议来指导协商进行。

sent.orig: In addition, students participate in a negotiation simulation, improve communication skills and learn about cross-cultural negotiation.
sent.trans: 此外，同学们模拟参与谈判，以增进沟通的技巧以及学习关于跨文化的谈判。
